document.full_text: u.s. officials have met with an aide to mullah mohammad omar at least three times in recent months in the first direct exploratory peace talks, officials in the region said.
document.title: u.s. has held meetings with aide to taliban leader, officials say
lines_and_colors: u.s. officials have met with an aide to mullah mohammad omar at least three times in recent months in the first direct exploratory peace talks, officials in the region said.
